start.title: Crossroads Dawn
start.text: You awaken at the crossroads, the air thick with {{tone}} promises of {{genre}} adventures.
start.flavor: Your companion {{companion}} waits patiently while you steady your {{signature}}.

choices.text: Investigate the whispering milestone
Explore the flickering market stall

milestone.title: The Milestone's Secret
milestone.text: The stone hums with stories of {{focus_trait}}. Tracing the runes reveals a path veiled in shimmering mist.
milestone.log: The milestone reveals a hidden route.

choices.text: Follow the revealed path
Consult your companion about the omen

market.title: Flickering Market
market.text: An itinerant vendor offers curios attuned to {{tone}} wanderers, bartering tales for trinkets.
market.log: You bargain at the flickering market.

choices.text: Head toward the storyteller's fire
Inspect the milestone after all

return.title: Companion's Counsel
return.text: {{companion}} studies the rune and suggests a moonlit glade said to answer earnest hearts.

choices.text: Heed the advice and seek the glade
Find the elder storyteller first

storyteller.title: Elder of Echoes
storyteller.text: An elder recounts a legend about {{focus_trait}} binding kindred spirits across distance.
storyteller.log: An elder shares a guiding tale.

choices.text: Carry the charm to the glade
Reflect on the tale and head home

glade.title: Moonlit Glade
glade.text: Moonlight collects into a mirrorlike pool, reflecting futures shaped by {{motivation}}.
glade.flavor: The air carries music reminiscent of {{focus_trait}}, resonating with your {{signature}}.

choices.text: Offer the runed token to the waters
choices.hint: Tokens earned through fortune may unlock hidden paths.

choices.text: Swear an oath with your companion
Release the storyteller's charm
Gaze quietly and carry the moment

end_mirror.title: Reflection of Potential
end_mirror.text: The pool reveals a path where {{motivation}} is fulfilled through shared {{focus_trait}}.
end_mirror.flavor: With {{companion}} at your side, you feel ready for the chapters ahead.
end_mirror.log: The mirror pool welcomes your offering.

end_oath.title: Oathbound Companions
end_oath.text: Your vow echoes across the glade, weaving {{playstyle_trait}} into a promise of protection.
end_oath.log: You swear a binding oath with your companion.

end_charm.title: Charm of Guiding Stories
end_charm.text: The charm bursts into guiding lights, charting a {{tone}} road for other wanderers.
end_charm.flavor: Your legend becomes a beacon powered by {{focus_trait}}.
end_charm.log: The storyteller's charm ignites the path.

end_reflect.title: Quiet Resolve
end_reflect.text: You preserve the memory of the glade, trusting {{playstyle_trait}} to lead you when the time is right.

start.title: Velvet Conservatory
start.text: Candlelight and soft music welcome you to the Velvet Conservatory, a refuge where hearts explore {{genre}} delights without shame.
start.flavor: {{companion}} traces the edge of your {{signature}}, inviting you to choose how boldly you'll indulge.

choices.text: Accept the host's invitation to the masked salon
Slip with {{companion}} into the moonlit garden

mask.title: Invitation Behind Silk
mask.text: An enigmatic host ties a silken mask over your eyes, promising conversations where desire and trust intertwine.

choices.text: Share your secret yearnings with the circle
Let the host guide you onto the private balcony

garden.title: Moonlit Garden
garden.text: You and {{companion}} wander between jasmine-draped arches where couples steal whispers and gentle touches.
garden.log: You drift through the moonlit garden.

choices.text: Invite your companion to the secret grove
Follow laughter toward the hidden cascade

salon.title: Confessions in Amber Light
salon.text: Voices around you trade fantasies of devotion and playful mischief, encouraging you to describe how {{motivation}} fuels your desires.
salon.log: You bare your heart within the salon.

choices.text: Craft a mutual vow with the alluring host
Seek {{companion}} to share the warmth you've gathered

balcony.title: Balcony Beneath Starlight
balcony.text: The city hums below while the host invites you to remove the mask and match their breathing, trading promises in hushed tones.
balcony.log: You share vulnerable breath beneath the stars.

choices.text: Promise a night of slow discovery together
Invite the host to join your trusted circle

grove.title: Secret Grove
grove.text: Soft moss cushions your steps as {{companion}} entwines their fingers with yours, asking how {{playstyle_trait}} shapes your affections.

choices.text: Seal the moment with a whispered promise
Ask the host to honor your bond

cascade.title: Hidden Cascade
cascade.text: Steam rises from a secluded pool where lovers laugh softly, beckoning you to shed inhibition and join their playful revelry.

choices.text: Step into the waters and celebrate your body
Collect the warmth to share privately later

tryst_salon.title: Lovers' Accord
tryst_salon.text: Together with the salon circle, you script a night of sensual storytelling, taking turns offering gentle caresses and affirmations.
tryst_salon.flavor: You exchange boundaries before inviting each new touch, weaving safety into every gasp and sigh.
tryst_salon.log: You design a sensual celebration in the salon.

tryst_host.title: Host's Devoted Focus
tryst_host.text: In a chamber draped with velvet, the host traces constellations over your skin, promising evenings of attentive exploration whenever you desire them.
tryst_host.flavor: Playful touches and heartfelt words carry you through the night until dawn blushes through the curtains.
tryst_host.log: You commit to an intimate night with the host.

tryst_companion.title: Companion's Tender Promise
tryst_companion.text: {{companion}} guides you somewhere secluded, exploring each other's boundaries with consent and patient curiosity until your hearts slow in unison.
tryst_companion.flavor: You share lingering kisses and soft laughter, trusting {{focus_trait}} to keep the connection bright.
tryst_companion.log: You share an intimate evening with your companion.

tryst_circle.title: Circle of Trust
tryst_circle.text: You join a circle of lovers who honor boundaries before delighting in aromatic oils, whispered compliments, and the thrill of being seen.
tryst_circle.flavor: Mutual consent shapes every caress, and the night becomes a celebration of shared pleasure and respect.
tryst_circle.log: You bask in a consensual celebration among new friends.

start.title: Gathering of the Harmonic Caravan
start.text: Caravans of storytellers and tinkerers converge beneath auroral banners, inviting you to guide their next move.
start.flavor: Rumor speaks of a threat to the trade roads unless a leader balances {{focus_trait}} with {{playstyle_trait}}.
start.log: The caravan looks to you for direction.

choices.text: Visit the performance circle
Study the luminous archives
Scout the surrounding wilds

caravan.title: Voices in Rehearsal
caravan.text: Performers test harmonies that could soothe restless spirits along the road.

choices.text: Lead the rehearsal yourself
Observe the mechanist tuning instruments

mechanist.title: Mechanist's Workshop
mechanist.text: A mechanist demonstrates a clockwork amplifier attuned to {{genre}} rhythms.

choices.text: Schedule the amplifier for the finale
Tinker with the device alongside your companion

rehearsal.title: Leading the Chorus
rehearsal.text: You guide the voices into resonance, weaving tales of {{motivation}} achieved.
rehearsal.log: You lead the rehearsal to victory.

choices.text: Perform for the gathered crowd
Collect whispers about looming dangers

crowd.title: Performance Under the Banners
crowd.text: The crowd offers gifts for your leadership, eager to support your {{motivation}}.

choices.text: Share the momentum at the junction

whispers.title: Gathered Whispers
whispers.text: Informants warn of saboteurs stalking the road, noting weaknesses in the caravan's morale.

choices.text: Prepare defenses at the junction

archives.title: Luminous Archives
archives.text: Crystalline shelves shimmer with records of previous pilgrimages.

choices.text: Decode the starlit codex
Consult the prism keeper

codex.title: Starlit Codex
codex.text: Ancient glyphs describe how {{focus_trait}} can shield caravans from harm.

choices.text: Bring the fragment to the junction

keeper.title: Prism Keeper
keeper.text: The keeper entrusts you with a prism key that focuses communal intentions.

choices.text: Plan with the caravan leaders
Share the key with your companion

wilds.title: Scouting the Wilds
wilds.text: You and {{companion}} explore the wild outskirts where strange echoes gather.

choices.text: Follow the glowing spores
Chase the wandering echo

grove.title: Resonant Grove
grove.text: A grove of luminescent blooms responds to your {{signature}}.

choices.text: Bring the bloom to reinforce the junction

echo.title: Wandering Echo
echo.text: The echo mirrors fears of the road ahead but also reveals hidden paths.
echo.log: You learn from the wandering echo.

choices.text: Warn the caravan council
Lead the plan at the junction

junction.title: Crossroads Council
junction.text: Leaders gather at the junction, debating how to secure the route before dawn.
junction.flavor: All eyes fall on you to balance {{focus_trait}} with the caravan's needs.

choices.text: Unite the voices into a single anthem
Channel resonance into a protective ward
choices.hint: Natural resonance can shield the road.

choices.text: Deploy the mechanist's amplifier
Trust {{companion}} to lead the scouts
Focus the prism key to forge alliances
Consult the starlit fragment for guidance

finale_celebration.title: Caravan Celebration
finale_celebration.text: Your anthem rallies the caravan, fulfilling {{motivation}} while honoring {{focus_trait}}.
finale_celebration.flavor: The road ahead feels safer beneath your guidance.

finale_guard.title: Ward of Resonance
finale_guard.text: The ward pulses with {{tone}} energy, forming a barrier guided by {{playstyle_trait}}.

finale_clockwork.title: Clockwork Overture
finale_clockwork.text: The amplifier projects melodies that confuse saboteurs and bolster trade.

finale_duo.title: Bonded Scouts
finale_duo.text: You and {{companion}} lead swift scouts, ensuring paths remain open for those who follow.
finale_duo.log: You and your companion safeguard the road.

finale_alliance.title: Alliance of Prism Lights
finale_alliance.text: The prism key links distant allies, aligning their efforts with your {{motivation}}.

finale_fragment.title: Starlit Guidance
finale_fragment.text: Visions from the fragment reveal safe passages and hidden opportunities.
finale_fragment.log: The starlit fragment charts the future.

meta.title: Siege of the Veiled Bastion
meta.subtitle: A {{tone}} {{genre}} saga pursuing {{motivation}} across perilous fronts.

start.title: Summoning the War Council
start.text: Rumors speak of the Veiled Bastion choking the trade arteries. Leaders gather, awaiting your strategy.
start.flavor: Your {{signature}} rests on the table beside maps annotated with {{focus_trait}}.

choices.text: Recruit allies in the tavern district
Plan at the grand council chamber
Scout the wilderness approaches

tavern.title: Tavern of Prospects
tavern.text: Mercenaries and informants crowd around, curious about your {{tone}} mission.
tavern.log: You canvas the tavern for support.

choices.text: Recruit a daring fighter
Recruit a cunning informant

recruit_blade.title: Daring Fighter
recruit_blade.text: A warrior pledges their blade, admiring your resolve toward {{motivation}}.

choices.text: Report to the council with your new ally

recruit_rogue.title: Cunning Informant
recruit_rogue.text: An informant slips you coded messages about the bastion's routines.

choices.text: Bring the intelligence to the council

council.title: Grand Council Chamber
council.text: Strategists and mages await your command, keen to align with {{focus_trait}}.
council.log: You take command of the council.

choices.text: Draft a meticulous siege plan
Send spies to probe the bastion
Signal the wilderness scouts

strategize.title: Detailed Strategies
strategize.text: Your quills dance across the map, arranging {{playstyle_trait}} into staged assaults.

choices.text: Prepare supply lines to support the siege
Coordinate with the arcane sages

spy.title: Shadowed Agents
spy.text: Spies vanish into the night to pry secrets from the bastion's walls.
spy.log: You dispatch spies into the shadows.

choices.text: Ambush the enemy couriers
Expose traitors within your ranks

wilderness.title: Wilderness Recon
wilderness.text: You and {{companion}} traverse hidden paths seeking weaknesses in the bastion's perimeter.

choices.text: Scout the ancient ruins nearby
Forge an alliance with roaming guardians

scout_ruins.title: Forgotten Ruins
scout_ruins.text: The ruins conceal catacombs rumored to open beneath the bastion.

choices.text: Map the catacombs for infiltration
Return to the council with news

alliance_guardians.title: Guardian Accord
alliance_guardians.text: Forest guardians agree to aid you if {{focus_trait}} is respected.
alliance_guardians.log: You forge a pact with guardians.

choices.text: Escort the guardians toward the bastion
Investigate rumors of a rift

supply.title: Securing Supply Lines
supply.text: Merchants pledge support, lending weight to your {{motivation}}.

choices.text: Protect the caravans personally
Send the supplies ahead to the front

sage_bridge.title: Arcane Bridge
sage_bridge.text: Sages weave a bridge of light that could deliver troops past the walls.

choices.text: Test the bridge in a daring raid
Reserve it for the final assault

ambush.title: Courier Ambush
ambush.text: You seize enemy dispatches before they reach the bastion.

choices.text: Interrogate the captured couriers
Race to the bastion with new intel

expose.title: Traitors Revealed
expose.text: You uncover spies within your own ranks and turn them to your cause.

choices.text: Redeploy loyalists to key positions
Spread an inspiring message

catacombs.title: Underway Network
catacombs.text: The catacomb map reveals an entrance beneath the bastion's keep.

choices.text: Plant diversions within the tunnels
Open the secret gate during the assault

caravan_defense.title: Defending the Caravan
caravan_defense.text: You repel raiders, ensuring the siege will be supplied.

choices.text: March with the caravan toward the bastion

bridge_trial.title: Bridge Raid
bridge_trial.text: You and {{companion}} lead a strike across the arcane bridge, testing its stability.

choices.text: Launch a surprise attack on the bastion

interrogate.title: Prisoner Interrogations
interrogate.text: The couriers reveal schedules and hidden gates.

choices.text: Coordinate the assault using the schedules
Bolster the front lines at the bastion

inspire.title: Rallying Cry
inspire.text: Your speech reminds everyone why {{motivation}} must prevail.

choices.text: Lead the morale charge

diversions.title: Hidden Diversions
diversions.text: Explosives and distractions are placed along the underground paths.
diversions.log: You plant diversions in the tunnels.

choices.text: Signal the diversions during the assault

rift.title: Rift Discovery
rift.text: A shimmering rift promises a shortcut behind enemy lines.

choices.text: Plan to use the rift mid-siege

bastion.title: Siege of the Veiled Bastion
bastion.text: Siege horns echo as you orchestrate the assault, balancing {{focus_trait}} and {{playstyle_trait}}.
bastion.flavor: Every ally watches to see how {{motivation}} will reshape the bastion's rule.

choices.text: Command the armies using the siege plan
Send guardians across the arcane bridge
Open the secret gate with the ancient key
Unleash the tunnel diversions
Lead a rift strike behind the bastion
Coordinate allied guardians on the front
Reinforce with the supply caravan
Deploy informants for sabotage
Charge personally with {{signature}}
Retreat to regroup for another day

final_command.title: Coordinated Command
final_command.text: Your plan unfolds flawlessly, knitting {{focus_trait}} into victory and advancing {{motivation}}.
final_command.log: The siege succeeds under your command.

final_bridge.title: Bridge of Light
final_bridge.text: Guardians race across the arcane bridge, opening the gates to those who dream of {{motivation}}.

final_gate.title: Gate of Echoing Steps
final_gate.text: The ancient key opens a silent passage, allowing {{playstyle_trait}} to shine in precise strikes.
final_gate.log: You slip through the secret gate.

final_diversion.title: Explosive Diversions
final_diversion.text: Fireworks bloom, distracting defenders while your forces secure the walls.
final_diversion.log: Diversions tip the battle in your favor.

final_rift.title: Rift Maneuver
final_rift.text: You emerge behind enemy lines, fulfilling {{motivation}} with daring precision.
final_rift.log: The rift strike collapses the bastion's command.

final_alliance.title: Alliance Triumph
final_alliance.text: Guardians and allies unite, proving {{focus_trait}} can reshape power.

final_supply.title: Enduring Supply
final_supply.text: Shielded wagons keep the assault relentless until the bastion yields.
final_supply.log: Supplies sustain the siege to victory.

final_shadow.title: Shadow Sabotage
final_shadow.text: Informants disrupt defenses, letting your forces sweep through.
final_shadow.log: Sabotage clears a path to triumph.

final_duel.title: Champion's Duel
final_duel.text: You and {{companion}} confront the bastion commander, proving {{motivation}} cannot be denied.
final_duel.log: You win the duel at the bastion's heart.

final_retreat.title: Measured Retreat
final_retreat.text: You preserve your forces, knowing {{playstyle_trait}} will reveal another chance.

meta.title: Chronicle of the Sky Loom
meta.subtitle: An epic {{tone}} {{genre}} odyssey weaving {{focus_trait}} into the fate of the skies.

start.title: Summit of Beginnings
start.text: At the summit observatory, constellations realign, heralding a threat to the aerial realms.
start.flavor: Only one guided by {{motivation}} and {{playstyle_trait}} can respond in time.
start.log: You witness omens in the skies.

choices.text: Consult the star archivists
Rally the skyship captains
Descend to the world below for allies

archives.title: Star Archives
archives.text: Ancient charts reveal fractures spreading across ley-lines.
archives.log: You glean knowledge from the archives.

choices.text: Decode the sky loom pattern
Seek the archivist council's blessing

skyship.title: Deck of the Stormrider
skyship.text: Captains await your command to secure the skies for {{motivation}}.
skyship.log: You take command of the skyships.

choices.text: Chart a course to the tempest border
Patrol for looming threats

worldroot.title: Worldroot Assembly
worldroot.text: Below the clouds, druids and artificers debate how {{focus_trait}} can restore balance.

choices.text: Forge an alliance with the earthbound
Return to the summit with reinforcements

pattern.title: Sky Loom Pattern
pattern.text: Mathematical constellations predict a collapse unless threads are rewoven.
pattern.log: You decode the sky loom's warnings.

choices.text: Project the pattern to the captains
Synchronize with {{companion}}'s intuition

council.title: Archivist Council
council.text: Archivists lend artifacts tuned to {{tone}} destinies.

choices.text: Empower the sky loom compass
Share the prism with allied captains

tempest.title: Tempest Border
tempest.text: Living storms swirl with messages about impending collapse.

choices.text: Harness the storm into a ward
Follow lightning trails to hidden bastions

patrol.title: Sky Patrol
patrol.text: Patrols intercept raiders seeking to exploit the chaos.

choices.text: Deliver the charts to the archives
Use the charts to plan a counterstrike

alliance.title: Earthbound Alliance
alliance.text: The worldroot coalition pledges aid if {{focus_trait}} guides your choices.

choices.text: Unite them with the sky captains
Channel their strength into the loom

summit_return.title: Return to the Summit
summit_return.text: Allies gather, awaiting the weaving of destiny.

choices.text: Prepare the sky loom station
Deploy to the storm front

companion_sync.title: Shared Resonance
companion_sync.text: You and {{companion}} synchronize visions, blending logic and intuition.
companion_sync.log: Your bond deepens through the loom.

choices.text: Translate the vision into a flight plan
Imprint the resonance on the loom

loom_station.title: Sky Loom Station
loom_station.text: The loom awaits threads from allies, artifacts, and your {{motivation}}.
loom_station.log: You approach the sky loom core.

choices.text: Weave the loom with harmonic prisms
Integrate the worldroot pact
Deploy the alliance standard
Thread the loom using the diagram
Channel the storm ward
Focus on your bond with {{companion}}
Call for aid from the sky captains
Open the loom to future wanderers

stormward.title: Storm Ward
stormward.text: You tame the tempest into a shield of crackling light.

choices.text: Bring the ward to the loom

hidden_bastion.title: Hidden Bastion
hidden_bastion.text: A fortress in the clouds holds prisoners vital to {{motivation}}.

choices.text: Send the navigators to aid the loom
Escort them to the skyship fleet

counterstrike.title: Precision Counterstrike
counterstrike.text: You strike at raider strongholds, ensuring safe skies.

choices.text: Devote the momentum to the loom

loom_prism.title: Prismatic Weave
loom_prism.text: Prismatic light amplifies {{focus_trait}}, stabilizing the loom's resonance.

loom_worldroot.title: Worldroot Threads
loom_worldroot.text: Earthbound energy anchors the loom, honoring {{motivation}}.

loom_alliance.title: Alliance Weave
loom_alliance.text: United banners form new constellations reflecting {{focus_trait}}.
loom_alliance.log: Allies leave their mark on the loom.

loom_diagram.title: Diagrammatic Symphony
loom_diagram.text: Mathematics guides each thread, blending {{playstyle_trait}} with precision.
loom_diagram.log: The loom responds to your calculations.

loom_storm.title: Storm Threading
loom_storm.text: Storm energy crackles through the loom, fortifying the skies.

loom_companion.title: Bonded Thread
loom_companion.text: {{companion}} adds heart to the weave, ensuring {{motivation}} serves all.

loom_captains.title: Captain's Accord
loom_captains.text: Sky captains pledge ongoing patrols to protect the loom.

loom_future.title: Future Horizons
loom_future.text: You leave parts of the loom unwoven, inviting future adventurers guided by {{playstyle_trait}}.
loom_future.log: You open the loom to new legends.
